name: pnp-graph-connector-dotnet-csharp-m365-roadmap
title: Ingest M365 Roadmap content in Microsoft 365 using Microsoft Graph connectors using C# and .NET
shortDescription: This sample contains a Microsoft Graph connector that shows how to Ingest M365 Roadmap content in Microsoft 365 using Microsoft Graph connectors.
longDescription: This sample contains a Microsoft Graph connector that shows how to Ingest M365 Roadmap content in Microsoft 365 using Microsoft Graph connectors.

references.name: Microsoft Graph connectors overview
